p: Maertens et al. used maribavir (dose-blinded) to treat cytomegalovirus reactivation preemptively for recipients of hematopoietic cell or solid organ transplants (SOT) (â‰¥18 years old) with CMV reactivation in a phase II and open-label clinical trial [ 46]. The results showed that maribavir at a dose of at least 400 mg twice daily had efficacy like that of valganciclovir for removing CMV viremia. Though a higher incidence of gastrointestinal adverse events were found in the maribavir -treated group, the neutropenia incidence was lower [ 46].
